DOC.detailed_description: Study participant previously immunize Japanese Encephalitis Chimeric Virus ( JE-CV ) vaccine receive single dose new JE-CV follow 5 year immunogenicity . The control ( JE-CV naive ) participant receive either one dose JE-CV one dose varicella vaccine . All participant monitor safety 6 month post vaccination .
